detailed_description:
A CINEMATIC SPACE SHOOTER - WISHLIST NOW!



About the Game

24 tracks in big beat styles, electropunk, dubstep and hard rock from the master of the genre - Devil Dragon Tatoo, in high quality 320 kbps, will not leave indifferent connoisseurs of groove and a powerful bit.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10 64 bit
  • Processor: core i3 6100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 TI
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: The sound device compatible with DirectX® 9
